name: The Augur
description:
I am creating The Augur, a program that allows you to play Solo RPGs and also functions as a tool for GMs, World Builders, and even Writers.

The Augur has a solo RPG system that is based on Ironsworn, its fully moddable and people can create and share what they make. The Augur is completely free and I started a Patreon to support its development, my patreons will get monthly content in the form of adventures, tome of foes, bestiaries, lore, world settings, and more. Everything is released in PDFs and also as modules you can load and play in The Augur.

I am constantly updating and adding features to The Augur. Come and join me in this adventure as we make the ultimate tool for Solo RPGs and GMs together.

Latest Update:

I will start adding the month and day of the upload to each file I upload from now on. And the last upload fixes a nasty bug that occurred when you typed certain characters (´ ’ ‘ — …) as text in the description and other text field of the game.
